channel.title: I am Eric
channel.description: Recent content on I am Eric

item.title: Me
item.description: Hello, I’m Eric. I’m currently enrolled in the University of Calgary for Electrical Engineering. I have a double minor in Astrophysics and Digital Engineering (Machine Learning & AI). Additionally, I am currently club president of Ori-Aid, the university’s official origami club/charity. Arch linux is my go-to operating system, it works off the premise of a rolled-release, meaning that it is always changing and transforming, much like the world itself (but a virtual one)!
